title: What is BookMyShow Stream? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
BookMyShow Stream offers an incredible opportunity to watch your favorite movies from the comfort of your home.
You can buy or rent movies from a curated catalog of exclusive titles, including the best of classics, award-winning movies, select premiers, and never-seen-before festival favourites.
You can watch them online on any platform, including your phone, laptop, desktop or TV.
